channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: High Temperatures Burn Away 80% of Taiwan's Honey Harvest
item.description: Climate change has caused a sharp drop in Taiwan's honey harvests. Miaoli's beekeepers say honey production has dropped to 20% of a typical year.

item.title: Taiwan Belly Dancers Bagged 45 Medals In Seoul
item.description: A squad of belly dancers from Taiwan with ages ranging from 6 to 69 scooped no fewer than 45 medals at the Global Oriental Dance Festival in Seoul.

item.title: Overseas Donations for Hualien Earthquake Relief Reach Nearly US$40M
item.description: Donations from overseas to help relief and rebuilding work after the Hualien earthquake earlier this month have reached nearly US$40 million.

item.title: Opposition KMT Vies To Extend Life of Nuclear Power Plants
item.description: Taiwan's main opposition party, the Kuomintang or KMT, wants to amend the law to allow extending the service life of the country's nuclear power plants. The government has pledged
